ovdesc.p: The formats table is simply a place to store the valid format names.
It is used for validation of the internal and external formats in XT.RECORD.DEFS. The use and interpretation of these formats is handled within the programs XT.MATCH.MAP and XT.OUTPUT.

desc.p: Describes the format named by this record.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
Identifies the formats of incoming or outgoing data.
